text: 3[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] If the threat level is 2 or greater, end the run. [subroutine] If the threat level is 4 or greater, end the run.
title: N-Pot
